results.title: Analysis of quinary therapy targeting multiple cardiovascular diseases using UV spectrophotometry and chemometric tools.
results.journal: Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc
results.text_hl: Such combination is very useful for treating various @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ (@DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@) including @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@high blood pressure@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ in addition to its antiplatelet aggregating activity.

citations.NLM: Elsonbaty A, Serag A, Abdulwahab S, Hassan WS, Eissa MS. Analysis of quinary therapy targeting multiple cardiovascular diseases using UV spectrophotometry and chemometric tools. Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc. 2020 Sep 5;238():118415. PMID: 32403073
citations.BibTeX: @article{32403073, title={Analysis of quinary therapy targeting multiple cardiovascular diseases using UV spectrophotometry and chemometric tools.}, author={Elsonbaty A and Serag A and Abdulwahab S and Hassan WS and Eissa MS}, journal={Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc}, volume={238}, pages={118415}}

results.title: Formulation and Evaluation of Fixed-Dose Combination of Bilayer Gastroretentive Matrix Tablet Containing Atorvastatin as Fast-Release and Atenolol as Sustained-Release
results.text_hl: It can be concluded that the bilayer tablets of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ can be successfully employed for the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ together through oral administration of single tablet.

citations.NLM: Dey S, Chattopadhyay S, Mazumder B. Formulation and Evaluation of Fixed-Dose Combination of Bilayer Gastroretentive Matrix Tablet Containing Atorvastatin as Fast-Release and Atenolol as Sustained-Release Biomed Res Int. 2014;2014():396106. PMID: 24527446
citations.BibTeX: @article{24527446, title={Formulation and Evaluation of Fixed-Dose Combination of Bilayer Gastroretentive Matrix Tablet Containing Atorvastatin as Fast-Release and Atenolol as Sustained-Release}, author={Dey S and Chattopadhyay S and Mazumder B}, journal={Biomed Res Int}, volume={2014}, pages={396106}}

results.title: The effect of celiprolol on the blood lipid profile in hypertensive patients with high cholesterol levels.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to compare the effects of chronic antihypertensive therapy with either @CHEMICAL_Celiprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017272 @@@celiprolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on plasma @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Fogari R, Zoppi A, Tettamanti F, Malamani G, Pasotti C. The effect of celiprolol on the blood lipid profile in hypertensive patients with high cholesterol levels. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1991 Jan;4 Suppl 6():1287-90. PMID: 1826213
citations.BibTeX: @article{1826213, title={The effect of celiprolol on the blood lipid profile in hypertensive patients with high cholesterol levels.}, author={Fogari R and Zoppi A and Tettamanti F and Malamani G and Pasotti C}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={4 Suppl 6}, pages={1287-90}}

results.title: [Comparative effects of captopril and atenolol on lipid metabolism in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients treated with pravastatin. A multicenter controlled trial].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: A randomized double-blind trial was conducted in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ subjects with @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ in order to compare the effects of @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism.

citations.NLM: Witchitz S, Provendier O, Arsenescu I. [Comparative effects of captopril and atenolol on lipid metabolism in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients treated with pravastatin. A multicenter controlled trial]. Presse Med. 1996 Dec 21;25(40):2013-6. PMID: 9082374
citations.BibTeX: @article{9082374, title={[Comparative effects of captopril and atenolol on lipid metabolism in hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patients treated with pravastatin. A multicenter controlled trial].}, author={Witchitz S and Provendier O and Arsenescu I}, journal={Presse Med}, volume={25}, number={40}, pages={2013-6}}
